problem.markdown:
>>What is the total production rate of this machine in terms of parts per hour for all parts? (Please enter 4 decimal places) <<
= 93.3333 +-1
>>What is the yield? (Yield is the percentage of good parts out of all parts produced) (Please enter 4 decimal places, if your answer is 50%, please enter 0.5) <<
=0.9614 +-0.1
>>What is the total production rate of good parts in terms of parts per hour? (Please enter 4 decimal places) <<
= 89.73 +-1
[explanation] The total production rate is given by \( 100(P_1+P_2+P_3)\). The total yield is given by \(\frac{P_1+0.98P_2+0.9P_3}{P_1+P_2+P_3} \). The good production rate is given by \( 100(P_1+0.98P_2+0.9P_3)\). [explanation]
problem.label: What is the total production rate of this machine in terms of parts per hour for all parts? (Please enter 4 decimal places)
What is the yield? (Yield is the percentage of good parts out of all parts produced) (Please enter 4 decimal places, if your answer is 50%, please enter 0.5)
What is the total production rate of good parts in terms of parts per hour? (Please enter 4 decimal places)

div.p: The total production rate is given by \( 100(P_1+P_2+P_3)\).
The total yield is given by \(\frac{P_1+0.98P_2+0.9P_3}{P_1+P_2+P_3} \).
The good production rate is given by \( 100(P_1+0.98P_2+0.9P_3)\).
